description.en:
Hoodrat is a BEP-20 project built on the Binance Smart Chain in May 12th 2021. 

Hoodrat's main use case is tackling a key issue that everybody faces in the Defi sphere, which is to prevent rug-pulls from happening.

With a proprietary rug-pull assessment tool in the works, backed by a team of talented developers, finance and project managers, Hoodrat's ambitions aim to benefit the whole cryptosphere.
